text:
The Vanderpump Rules ex reveals what the future holds for his relationship with the SURver.

Things may not have ultimately worked out between Scheana Shay and Rob Valletta, as we learned during the most recent Vanderpump Rules reunion. However, Rob recently confirmed to Us Weekly that the two have remained friends since they broke up last year.

In fact, Rob isn't exactly ruling out rekindling his romance with Scheana in the future, either. "The way we broke up, it wasn’t a bad breakup," he told Us Weekly. "If there is the right time, we’ll find the right time.”

But for now, Rob is moving on. “Well, I am dating someone. I am dating someone as of a week and a half ago, so we will see what happens,” he shared. “She’s a pretty awesome person. But yeah, we’ll see.”

Scheana opened up about her breakup from Rob during the Vanderpump Rules Season 6 reunion. She explained that Rob started to "pull away" from her when the rumor about him kissing another girl came out during the season. "I was head-over-heels in love with him. I was for a really long time, and it didn't work out," Scheana said through tears during the reunion. "But I have loved Rob for 12 years, and he broke my f---ing heart. For the first time, that genuinely broke me."

When Andy Cohen asked Scheana if she's been dating a lot during her stint in the Las Vegas production of Sex Tips for Straight Women for a Gay Man, she said, "I've been going out quite a bit, yeah."

Rumors that Scheana was dating The Bachelorette alum Robby Hayes broke in March, but the SURver insisted that the two were just "very good friends" during an interview with Us Weekly at the time.

Watch Scheana talk more about her post-Rob life, below.
title: Scheana Shay's Ex Rob Valletta Has Started Dating Again
